index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF CONSTRUCTION AND LAND USE
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to and prescribing fees for boiler, building, refrigeration, electrical, elevator, energy, gas piping, grading, mechanical, pressure vessel, signs, housing inspections, master use permits and land use approvals and other certificates and permits required by ordinance, and for the furnishing of certain services and materials; defining offenses and providing penalties and repealing Ordinances 113744 and 113864; and replacing the 1988 Permit Fee Ordinance (Chapter 22.900, Seattle Municipal Code).
